entity

Class Holiday

  • entity.Holiday
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Bean, Versionable

    public class Holiday
implements Bean, Versionable
    List of holidays.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Boolean AppliesToAllZones
      True if this holiday applies to all zones (in which case HolidayZones should be empty). If false and HolidayZones has elements, this holiday applies to those zones. If false and HolidayZones is empty, this holiday doesn't apply anywhere.
      Integer BeanVersion
      Auto-incremented object version
      ZoneSearchCriteria FilterCriteria
      The filter criteria, used for the region UI only.
      HolidayTag[] HolidayTags
      The tags that observe this holiday.
      HolidayZone[] HolidayZones
      The zones that observe this holiday.
      Key ID
      Internally managed primary key
      Long LoadCommandID
      LoadCommand for load where row was created. If not null this object was loaded via the loader.
      String Name
      The name of a holiday in the business calendar.
      Holiday_Name_L10N[] Name_L10N_ARRAY
      String Name_en_US
      String Name_ja_JP
      Date OccurrenceDate
      The date of a holiday in the business calendar.
      String PublicID
      ID or primary key of the row in the external system to which this row is mapped
      HolidayTagCode[] TagRange
      Returns the available holiday tags.
      HolidayTagCode[] TagsArray
      Returns the holiday's tags.
      String TagsString
      Returns the tags that observe this holiday.
      String[] ZoneCodes
      An array of the region's zones. If the filter criteria is set, it filters the return set by the filter criteria.
      List<Object> ZoneList
      Returns an alphabetized arraylist of the zones covered by the given region. Zones are represented as strings. Strips leading and trailing whitespace.
      String Zones
      Returns an alphabetized arraylist of the zones covered by the given region. Zones are represented as strings. Strips leading and trailing whitespace.

      boolean containsZone(Country country, ZoneType zoneType, String zone)
      If this region contains a zone of the given type and value? The string matching is case-insensitive NOTE: this will not match if a zip+4 value is provided. You must strip off the +4 before passing to this method.

      • getHolidayZones

        HolidayZone[] getHolidayZones(ZoneType zt)
        This wraps the {@link #getHolidayZonesQuery(ZoneType)} method, converting the result to an array of HolidayZone objects.
        Parameters:
        zt - the zone type
        Returns:
        region zones of the specified type.

      • getHolidayZonesQuery

        IQueryBeanResult<HolidayZone> getHolidayZonesQuery(ZoneType zt)
        This returns the set of HolidayZones of the specified type.
        Parameters:
        zt - the zonetype to filter the HolidayZone objects by.
        Returns:
        a queryprocessor of HolidayZone

      • setTagsArray

        void setTagsArray(HolidayTagCode[] tags)
        Sets the holiday's tags.
        Parameters:
        tags - the tags

      • containsZone

        boolean containsZone(Country country,
                   ZoneType zoneType,
                   String zone)
        If this region contains a zone of the given type and value? The string matching is case-insensitive NOTE: this will not match if a zip+4 value is provided. You must strip off the +4 before passing to this method.
        Parameters:
        country -
        zoneType - the zone type, must not be null
        zone - the zone string, must not be null
        Returns:
        true if the region containsZone a zone of the given type, false otherwise

      • setZoneCodes

        void setZoneCodes(String[] zones)
        Set the zones.
        Parameters:
        zones - the zones

      • setZones

        void setZones(String zones)
        Set the zones (comma-delimited list) for the region.
        Parameters:
        zones - comman separated list of zones
